tldr: Affected versions of this package possess insecure handling of JWT tokens when running in server-side rendering (SSR) contexts. Specifically, when a guest user adds a product to their cart and enters shipping details, clicking `Continue to delivery` directly links the cart to the email of the last registered user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the data of registered users.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@medusajs/medusa` library to the patch version.
